layouts.title: Page Layouts
pars: Whistlepost provides some standard page layouts that you can use to structure your page content.
Container layouts are based on CSS grid capabilities, and provide some of the more common layouts used for site design.

dynamic.title: Dynamic Container
pars: The Dynamic Container layout provides a common layout that will automatically adjust the number of rows and columns based on the viewport size.

application.title: Application Container
pars: The Application layout provides a common layout for web applications: a header, footer and side navigation.

application-with-sidebar.title: Application Container with Sidebar
pars: A slight variation on the Application container layout adds a sidebar on the right.

holygrail.title: Holy Grail Container
pars: The Holy Grail layout provides one of the most popular layouts, including header, footer, sidebar and top navigation.
